name: run

params.name: -e, --env ENV
params.desc: environment variables to set (use ';' to split multiple vars)

params.name: -x, --exit-code
params.desc: passthrough the exit code of the remote command

params.name: -r, --remote REMOTE
params.desc: git remote of app to run command against

params.name: --no-tty
params.desc: force the command to not run in a tty

subcommands.name: run:detached COMMAND
subcommands.desc: run a detached dyno, where output is sent to your logs

subcommands.name: run:rake COMMAND
subcommands.desc: WARNING: `heroku run:rake` has been deprecated. Please use `heroku run rake` instead."

examples: heroku run -s hobby -- myscript.sh -a arg1 -s arg2
